sources.title: The Magic Pencil (1940)
sources.description: Gandy Goose sends away for a radio giveway item, a magic Pencil. When the Magic Pencil arrives, Gandy's magic drawings cause all kinds of problems for Sourpuss The Cat and for himself. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-magic-pencil-1940/

metadata.Plot: Gandy Goose sends away for a radio giveway item, a magic Pencil. When the Magic Pencil arrives, Gandy's magic drawings cause all kinds of problems for Sourpuss The Cat and for himself.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
